name: Minigma
body:
### Welcome to Minigma
Minigma is a small basic attempt at encryption. A seed is generated based on a user input which creates a cypher which can be used to encode/decode messages. The entire program is local, with no network access whatsoever.

###Files:
```
stdafx.h
stdafx.cpp
Minigma.cpp
decode.cpp
decode.h
encoder.cpp
encoder.h
globalvars.h
targetver.h
```
*Was compiled using the MS VS2013 compiler.


##Statistics:
Percentage of messages that have been intercepted by the NSA:  | Percentage of messages that are so secure even God can't touch them:
------------- | -------------
0%  | 100%


#Testimony
>"This can literally stop the NSA."
>_-Edward Snowden_

##Download
If you want to download the executable file for Minigma, please download it [here](https://app.box.com/minigma).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
